enWisdom: Accepting admonition means taking a lesson [and putting into action]
The beneficial admonition is that which deters [from sin]
The best of admonitions is that which deters [from sin]

Wisdom: فَيَا لَهَا مَوَاعِظَ شَافِيَةً لَوْ صَادَفَتْ قُلُوباً زَاكِيَةً وَأَسْمَاعاً وَاعِيَةً وَآرَاءً عَازِمَةً
enWisdom: How effective these admonitions [would be] if only they were received by pure hearts, attentive ears and unwavering minds
